title: I have mixed feelings on the calling card.
body:
As I'm sure is the case for everyone who opened theirs, I got Sett as a champion permanent.

While this is definitely helpful for those who don't play as much or have less of the roster unlocked, it means a known chunk of players will be stacking up even more Blue Essence because they're not spending it on a new champ in his/her/its first week.
